summary: The Contoso Wireless tv product offers a range of features such as access to streaming services, HD picture quality, and voice command capabilities. It is available in a variety of sizes and prices starting at $200 and going up to $1,000. Payment plans and financing options are available, and most models are in stock in stores. Shipping is available within 2-3 business days, and a one year warranty is included with each purchase. An extensive customer service team is also available to answer any questions or concerns after purchase.
